title: ZBTP Common Definitions
description: Reusable definitions for ZBTP JSON objects (public keys, signatures, timestamps, hashes).

hex32.description: 32-byte value encoded as lowercase/uppercase hex (64 chars). Typically SHA-256 digest hex.

hex64.description: 64-byte value encoded as hex (128 chars). Typically Ed25519 signature hex.

publicKey.description: Ed25519 public key encoded as hex (32 bytes = 64 hex chars). Implementations MAY also accept alternative encodings but canonical proofs use hex.

signature.description: A detached signature object containing an Ed25519 signature and the signer's public key.

signatureHex.description: Compact signature representation as a hex string (128 hex chars).
